title: (x) 5 fonts from records - ITC Serif Gothic, Nobel, Eurostile, Helvetica, Kaufmann, Aarcover {Dav, Marc O, Mike F}
content:
hi there  
i was trying to identify these fonts, they’re mostly from cover records  
ill appreciate if you can help me to identify which one they are  
most importantly the first 3

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [metll.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080503184811/http:/typophile.com/files/metll.gif) | 1.36 KB |
| [quas.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080503184811/http:/typophile.com/files/quas.gif) | 18.28 KB |
| [shellc.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080503184811/http:/typophile.com/files/shellc.gif) | 10.12 KB |
| [wr.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080503184811/http:/typophile.com/files/wr.gif) | 29.41 KB |
| [bore.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080503184811/http:/typophile.com/files/bore.gif) | 5.9 KB |

 [‹ (x) Triumph Overdrive TR5 PI badge type - Eurostile, Engraver's Gothic/Sackers Gothic {Lauren, Lex}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080503184811/http:/typophile.com/node/17123 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Drengene Fra - Angora" DVD cover - League Night, Neutraface {Dav} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080503184811/http:/typophile.com/node/17128 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jahcoozi

comments.content:
metll.gif = Kill ’Em All - Probably ITC Serif Gothic, with a pre-digital alternate “E”  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-serif-gothic/black/charmap.htm...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080503184811/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-serif-gothic/black/charmap.html "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-serif-gothic/black/charmap.html")

wr.gif = [Kaufmann](http://web.archive.org/web/20080503184811/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/kaufmann/)  
bore.gif = An old typeface called static. Lots of versions of this exist. I’ll point you to David Rakowski’s [Aarcover](http://web.archive.org/web/20080503184811/http:/www.fontage.com/pages/aarcover.html).

real thanks a lot  
every font was accurate
Why, I wouldn’t expect anything less from three of our top IDers. :^)
